item.title: Learning Python Basics and Indexing
item.description: Python is a programming language, one of many, that is well developed and widely used by data scientists. It is known for being an easily readable language and is popular amoung the machine learning community. Iâ€™m assuming if you are reading this blog you are somewhat familar but some background information never hurts. Today, we are going to explore the backbone basics of Python. First, we are going to establish the main data types that exist in Python: intergers, float, string, and bool.
